page.title: 10SUMMER FAYRES
page.content:
The{school fayre}was on Saturday 22nd June 1985.It started at 2:30pm.There was a{white elephant stall,}some{swing {boats, win a football,}a{raffle ,bingo and several other games.{Radio {Cambridgeshire}was there. There was also beat the goaly.There was a judo demonstration and lots more.The school raised over Â£500. The{village}summer fayre was on Saturday 6th July.There were{floats.} There were the play school's,the school's and the W.I.float.The play school float came first.There were a lot of{games}on the stalls.There was guess the{teddy bears name,}guess how many{sweets}were in the jar,{pin the {donkey's tail, hook the ducks, apple {ducking, treasure hunt.}There were Red Indian dancers and a BMX display.
(By Shellie and Dawn aged 9 years)
